description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.5m in depth, maximum height of 2.8m and eaves height of 2.8m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce its amenity value. Recommendation: No objections

Clarification sought - you have submitted the form titled "Application for Removal or Variation of a Condition following Grant of Planning Permission" but have not provided details. Please confirm what you are applying for. If you intend to apply to discharge a condition then please complete and submit the form titled "Application for approval of details reserved by condition". You will be due a partial fee refund if you are applying to discharge a condition.
